attributes.action: abort the fees that companies charge for non direct debit payments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Companies are charging up to £5 per month to customers who do not wish to pay by direct debit!! How you choose to pay your bill is purely a personal choice for each individual, so how do companies get away with fining you for not paying how they want you to pay???

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
